Header: Gotabhaya Rajapaksa is called upon to reveal agreements reached with Tamil and Muslim leaders
Content: Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Democratic Front Attorney Rajika Kodithuwakku has said that the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Presidential candidate Gotabhaya Rajapaksa should reveal to the country about the agreements they have entered into with the Tamil and Muslim leaders. He was addressing a media briefing in Colombo today. Attorney Rajika Kodithuwakku mentioned that as the Sri Lanka Freedom Democratic Front the party should traverse on the democratic path. Former President Chandrika Kumaratunge has taken over the leadership of this Front and reached an agreement with the National Democratic Front along with other progressive forces today. On that occasion she mentioned that they would work for the victory of Sajith Premadasa the Presidential candidate of the National Democratic Front. He said that they had no secret deals. He said that Varadaraja Perumal hoisted the LTTE flag and then fled to India. It that particular person is supporting Gotabhaya Rajapaksa, It should be revealed to the country on what basis he was supporting Gotabhaya Rajapaksa. Thondaman announced that they were supporting Mhinda Rajapaksa on 32 agreements. These 32 agreement should also be revealed to the nation.
